			[1560] tabpanel 'Details'
				[1566] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1569] list ''
					[1570] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'The Volterra contemporary ceramic table lamp delivers elegant simplicity to complement interior decor in a main space, entryway, or bedroom. Blendable in palette, its crackled taupe-gray glaze finish with distressed details flatter a tapered ceramic body. This appealing lamp is designed by Osvaldo Mendoza for Uttermost, and features antique brushed brass finish steel accents.'
					[1572] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText '27 1/2" high overall. Shade is 10" high x 15" wide. Weighs 12 lbs.'
					[1574] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Uses one maximum 150 watt type A bulb (not included). 3-way switch. 110V.'
					[1576] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Volterra contemporary ceramic table lamp designed by Osvaldo Mendoza for Uttermost.'
					[1578] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Crackled taupe-gray glaze finish with distressed details over ceramic construction. Antique brushed brass finish steel accents.'
					[1580] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Round white linen hardback drum shade.'

The user has successfully added the 'Uttermost Volterra Crackled Taupe-Gray Ceramic Table Lamp' to their cart as indicated by the alert message. Since the goal is to add this product to the cart and it has already been done, the next step is to confirm the user's action and guide them to the shopping cart page if they want to proceed further.
